title: Looking for this Font for a carwash I bought
content:
Trying to complete my Carwash Menu board sign, and having trouble finding this font. Please help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043924/http:/typophile.com/files/1_2.JPG) | 106.05 KB |
| [2.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043924/http:/typophile.com/files/2_0.JPG) | 127.46 KB |
author: Catletr

comments.content: Please help me find this font. Not really sure if it was drawn manually or not. I am hoping I can find the font, so I dont have to change everything.

**[Hand Drawn](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725043924/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Hand%20Drawn%20LET%20-%20Plain&fid=cec4d716477b424c915ce7857de7f884&fsize=60&text=BEAR%20WASH&fit=1)** by Michael Gills [Letraset, 1993] available also from other foundries  
(it's probably manually emboldened by the designer of your sign)
Just beat me with Hand Drawn, good job Fivos
Wow thanks, So I take it I wont be able to use the Bear Wash on my Menu sign? I tried using just the letters from the pic, but it looks distorted when 100% at 36 x 60
Wow thanks, So I take it I wont be able to use the Bear Wash on my Menu sign? I tried using just the letters from the pic, but it looks distorted when 100% at 36 x 60
Go to My Fonts to get Hand Drawn (the font)
